mapper.select: select p.product_seq, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_del, pa.product_attach_sysname, pa.product_attach_ppath, pa.product_attach_pname, l.loc_name from product p, product_attach pa, location l where p.product_seq = pa.product_seq and p.product_seq = #{value} and pa.product_attach_main = 'y' and p.loc_seq = l.loc_seq

select p.product_description, pa.product_attach_sysname, pa.product_attach_ppath, pa.product_attach_main, pa.product_attach_pname, pa.product_attach_seq from product p, product_attach pa where p.product_seq = pa.product_seq and p.product_seq = #{value} and pa.product_attach_main='n'
mapper.update: update product set product_del = 'y', product_status = 'f' where product_seq = #{productSeq}
mapper.select: select u.user_id, pr.product_reply_content, pr.product_reply_regdate, pr.product_reply_seq from product p, product_reply pr, users u where pr.product_seq = p.product_seq and u.user_seq = pr.user_seq and pr.product_seq = #{value} and pr.product_reply_del = 'n' order by pr.product_reply_regdate
mapper.insert: insert into product_reply(product_reply_seq, product_reply_content, product_reply_regdate, product_reply_del, user_seq, product_seq) values(product_reply_seq.nextval, #{productReplyContent}, sysdate, 'n', #{userSeq}, #{productSeq})
mapper.select: select uv.usereval_score, uv.usereval_content, u.user_id, uv.usereval_regdate from product p, seller s, users u, usereval uv where s.product_seq = p.product_seq and s.product_seq = u.user_seq and uv.orderer_seq = u.user_seq and p.product_seq = #{value}
select max(product_attach_seq)+1 as product_attach_seq from product_attach
select max(product_seq) as product_seq from product
mapper.insert: insert into product(product_seq, product_name, product_regdate, product_description, product_price, product_status, product_del, loc_seq, cate_seq) values(product_seq.nextval, #{productName}, sysdate, #{productDescription}, #{productPrice}, 'c', 'n', #{locSeq}, #{cateSeq})

insert into product_attach(product_attach_seq, product_seq, product_attach_ppath, product_attach_pname, product_attach_sysname, product_attach_gubun, product_attach_main) values(product_attach_seq.nextval, #{productSeq}, #{productAttachPpath}, #{productAttachPname}, #{productAttachSysname}, 'p', #{productAttachMain})
mapper.update: update product set product_name = #{productName}, product_regdate = sysdate, product_description = #{productDescription}, product_price = #{productPrice}, loc_seq = #{locSeq}, cate_seq = #{cateSeq} where product_seq = #{productSeq} and product_del = 'n' and product_status = 'c'
